title: Errors in the Chart
text: The table entries for data values $$2$$, $$3$$, $$10$$, and $$18$$ are incorrect. This affects cumulative relative frequency for most values. Refer to the table to find the frequency of people who commute $$3$$ miles and divide it by the total number of people.

title: Percent of People
text: To find the percent of people that commute a certain distance, convert the relative frequency for that category into a percent.
